attributes.action: More openness of family court proceedings,right of fair trial,recognising abuse
attributes.additional_details:
Family court repeatedly used by applicants as a form of coercive control and emotional abuse against respondents.

Judges feeding applicants need for control

Applicants can repeatedly apply to family court with no proper assessment.

Respondents evidence rarely viewed or considered.

Counter claims from respondents not considered in court hearing.

One judge deciding fate of respondent and children  unfair

Judges threatening respondents with prison unfair

Judges not following proper protocols
attributes.background:
Multiple judges for hearings

No threat of prison for respondents

Proper review of ALL case documents

Recognition of feeding the need for applicants control

Recognition of coercive control

Restrict multiple applications without proper reviews

Open hearings where adults only involved
